aboutUs.title: Welcome to My Sitecore Diaries - A Journey from Sitecore to DXP and Beyond!
aboutUs.description: I am Jitendra Ghanekar, Sitecore Technology MVP 2024 and 3X Sitecore Certified professional. My channel is your go-to resource for mastering Sitecore and cutting-edge Digital Experience Platforms (DXP) technologies. Here you will discover valuable content designed to help you excel in your Sitecore journey:
points: Comprehensive videos on Sitecore 10 certification exam questions.
Expert guidance on Sitecore interview questions.
Step-by-step tutorials for beginners to advance your Sitecore skills.
Insights into other technologies enhancing DXP.
Latest trends and best practices in .NET and beyond.

list.title: Sitecore 360 Support
list.description: A fully managed Sitecore solution covering the entire development lifecycle—from presales and PoCs to production deployment and continuous optimization. Ensuring best practices, scalability, and ongoing enhancements, making your Sitecore platform future-ready.

list.title: Sitecore Academy & Practice Setup
list.description: A full-service offering designed to help organizations train, recruit, and establish a Sitecore practice. We provide structured training programs, interview frameworks, and strategic guidance to build a strong Sitecore team from the ground up.

list.title: Sitecore Expert Assist
list.description: From simple troubleshooting to resolving complex Sitecore challenges, provide on-demand support and guidance. Also mentor your team, ensuring they gain the skills needed to tackle Sitecore issues independently over time.

footer.text: © 2025 My Sitecore Diaries. All rights reserved.
